title: 2 Books by Dean Koontz (ePub Retail)
description:
The Neighbor: Every city has its wonders and mysteries. For the Pomerantz family, the most disturbing mystery at the moment is the identity and the intentions of their new neighbor, in this eBook original short storyÃ¢â‚¬â€a prequel to The City, the gripping and moving new novel by Dean Koontz.

The year is 1967. Malcolm Pomerantz is twelve, geeky and socially awkward, while his seriously bright sister, Amalia, is spirited and beautiful. Each is the otherÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s best friend, united by a boundless interest in the world beyond their dysfunctional parentsÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ unhappy home. But even the troubled Pomerantz household will seem to be a haven compared to the house next door, after an enigmatic and very secretive new neighbor takes up residence in the darkest hours of the night.

The City: #1 New York Times bestselling author Dean Koontz is at the peak of his acclaimed powers with this major new novel.
 
The city changed my life and showed me that the world is deeply mysterious. I need to tell you about her and some terrible things and wonderful things and amazing things that happened . . . and how I am still haunted by them. Including one night when I died and woke and lived again.
 
Here is the riveting, soul-stirring story of Jonah Kirk, son of an exceptional singer, grandson of a formidable Ã¢â‚¬Å“piano man,Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ a musical prodigy beginning to explore his own gifts when he crosses a group of extremely dangerous people, with shattering consequences. Set in a more innocent time not so long ago, The City encompasses a lifetime but unfolds over three extraordinary, heart-racing years of tribulation and triumph, in which Jonah first grasps the electrifying power of music and art, of enduring friendship, of everyday heroes.

The unforgettable saga of a young man coming of age within a remarkable family, and a shimmering portrait of the world that shaped him, The City is a novel that speaks to everyone, a dazzling realization of the evergreen dreams we all share. Brilliantly illumined by magic dark and light, itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s0a place where enchantment and malice entwine, courage and honor are found in the most unexpected quarters, and the way forward lies buried deep inside the heart.

Full Retail. ePub and Calibre reader ready. Metadata is complete and up to date.
